KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Pair comparison 019
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareGT compareNE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compare functions to do a case-sensitive comparison of two objects of the same type. A Boolean value is returned.

Syntax.Note: The first Pair is greater than the second Pair.
Syntax.Hints: If you prefer an integer resulting from the comparison (0 for equal, -1 for less than, and 1 for greater than), use the compare function.
